zh.welcomeP1: Hi, 歡迎光臨Yode的作品集網站
zh.welcomeP3: 將靈感轉變成有趣的體驗🫠
zh.cardDetail1: 下一代 ROG Ally 會是什麼樣子呢 ?
zh.cardDetail2: 跨裝置急救知識學習平台
zh.cardDetail3: 快速客製個人風格滑板
zh.boigraphyText:
我是一位剛踏入UX設計領域的初心者，之前從事約六年的土木工程和結構設計工作，目前正在自學轉職成為UX設計師。

我擅長繪圖、3D建模，喜歡燒腦發想問題的解決方法並分析。以往的經驗讓我能在天馬行空的設計中，同時考慮實際可行性。

未來希望在UX設計、產品設計的領域發展，提升使用者在各個角落的體驗！
zh.skillDetails:
AutoCAD,
Blender, Sketchup,
Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator,
HTML, CSS, JavaScript,
義式咖啡 ☕
zh.exTitle1: Google UX Design 專業認證
zh.exDetails2: 林同棪工程顧問 - 結構設計/橋梁設計/專案管理
zh.contactMeText: 請不吝留下您的意見，我會持續更新改進這個網站，期待收到您的留言，謝謝！
zh.name: 名字

en.welcomeP1: Hi, welcome to Yode's UX design portfolio
en.cardDetail1: What will the next generation of ROG Ally look like?
en.cardDetail2: Cross-device first aid knowledge learning platform
en.boigraphyText:
I am an entry-level designer aspiring to develop a career in the UX field.

Despite my previous work experience being in civil engineering and structure design, transitioning into UX design might seem unexpected. However, I approach this shift with enthusiasm and a willingness to learn.

My goal is to explore exciting opportunities in the UX field and cultivate my professional skills!
en.skillDetails:
AutoCAD,
Blender, Sketchup,
Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator,
HTML, CSS, JavaScript,
Making espresso ☕
en.exDetails2: TYLIN Construction Consultant - Structure design/Bridge design/Project management
en.contactMeText:
Please feel free to leave your comments.

I will continue to update and improve this website, and look forward to receiving your message.
